locations.title: TA Travel Center
locations.content: TA Travel Center may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: Today I had to pay for a shower $17.00. It's not the cost but the principal because we already fueled with them $500/$600/$700. I think Rick should've handle it better (there was no fight or even raising voice). But their district/regional ‚Ä¶
Massive place to park. Shower clean. Many room to maneuver compared to FJ. May need more fuel pump. A little dark at the end of the parking lot
Cashier was friendly, shower had hot water, gd pressure,  my only concern is the parking lot towards the back has no lights. A little unnerving if u need to walk across in the middle of the night.

‚Ä¶ Then there was another driver in there that was having trouble with his ultra one account on the kiosk and could not get a shower the girl refused to give him a shower even though he had the receipt showing he put 110 gallons in. I ended up ‚Ä¶

Staff is rude, changed policy about how much fuel you need for a shower, laundry credit card machine not working properly and not posted anyplace, shower not as clean as should be, breakfast buffet only gets 1.5 stars because biscuits are ‚Ä¶

All diesel pumps were slow if not broken, no attendant at the check out counter, dingy feel. The worst TA I've been to. The shower was nice except for the disgusting shower curtain. Very disappointed.

No showers. You can get one if you pay for it. No shower credits. 2nd TA in two days
Same thing.

Not good opened a new card at a different TA they never put my shower on after I fueled an the guy at the fuel desk made me feel like a lier when I told him about it. When my GF an I took are shower she went in to eat she ordered coffee for ‚Ä¶
Fifteen bucks for a dirty shower and the only place I've had a lizard knock on my cab.  The parking lot is big, though.
Had 2 wait 30 minutes for a shower THEN went into shower & had to ask for TOILET PAPER & BATH TOWELS. This is the WORST TA/PETRO I HAVE EVER BEEN IN. Never parking here again

showerReviews.reviewText: ‚Ä¶ . I had blood in my face. The staff gave me bandages and other stuff to help me. They offered me shower in their facility. They dialled Uber for me trying to result payment problems. They helped me carry my baggage and etc. They ‚Ä¶
People who post amazing 5 star reviews have never gone into a shower. ‚Ä¶
Dirty toilet in shower, dirty , Dirty fan‚Ä¶.. Pretty much normal for love travel stop. I‚Äôm gonna have to start making videos on this, for display on the Internet.

I hope I don't end up getting infection from this disgusting shower, this is why I don't like loves most of the time there disgusting. The so called trucker's that posted that this place is clean I is because they didn't take a shower. I ‚Ä¶

Showers are dirty and I went to grab a broom to sweep and one of associates said to younger employee go clean it young girl went and did somewhat sweep left still alot of dirt so me and my wife had to use the floor matt to sweep floor and ‚Ä¶

Came in for a shower. Shower was good. But maybe the worker you have cleaning the showers, shouldn‚Äôt be cleaning the showers. She‚Äôs on the phone cussing someone out. In front of God and everybody. Very unprofessional.

i've had better shower pressure in western states that actually have water issues. i can't imagine Michigan having water issues. my normal 5 minute shower took me 30 minutes today. how's that for water "conservation"? plus, only 1 hook to ‚Ä¶

locations.title: Arlene's Truck Stop
locations.content: Arlene's Truck Stop may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: 24 hour store. Diner closed Sunday. B&G were okay and home fries were undercooked, some almost raw. One shower $15. Nice little truck stop with one of those gas station chicken places inside too.
If I were a trucker, I'd love this place. Shower, fried chicken, lots of convenience items. Open 24 hours. Big back lot.
‚Ä¶ Their facilities are clean, stocked well and their staff members are friendly. There‚Äôs a shower if you need one with your stanky a$$. ‚Ä¶

Nice little ma and pop truck stop. $7 for a shower. Not sure if you have to pay to park. Food is fresh & homemade and very very good. Service is great. Will be back again. $8.95 for meal in picture (and 2 pieces of toast). Can‚Äôt beat it!

Great little truck stop.  The shower was pretty good for five bucks.  I'd definitely shower here again.  Food wasn't bad either.  Only complaint I have about the food was the canned carrots, otherwise, it was hot and tasted pretty decent ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ little restaurant is good and reasonably priced. You get big portions and the service is really good. The only issue I had was the cleanliness of the $10 shower. Probably won‚Äôt shower here again. Other than that, nice little place to stop ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ . It has very kind people and amazing home cooked food. It is amazing with lots of space. Not too loud and yet, you can tell the place has vigour. They even have a shower too which is amazing. And the coffee is better then the big stops.

‚Ä¶ stop. There is paved parking lot with out holes and it doesn't get to busy. Pumps are new and work very well. Shower is older but clean, shower stall is a bit tight but enough to get the job done. Food is delicious ans priced very well.

Arlenes truck stop just honestly has a little of everything to offer! Out on the road traveling and need an affordable place to shower for just 7 dollars! Or pop over to the restaurant and get a trucker sized meal for some of the best ‚Ä¶
Usually plenty of parking, even late at night. They are still closing at 8pm even for fuel/bathrooms, but there is a port-a-john outside. $5 shower, friendly staff. Good local spot, and quiet.

showerReviews.reviewText: The service was wonderful (on both shifts), the store was clean, restrooms and showers clean but... the water smells!!! I was told is well water. I know I'm clean after the shower but at the same time I feel like I stink worse than before ‚Ä¶

Shower floor was cracked and had black mold. One of the staff was really rude. I left my shampoo and soap and when I went back into grab it I was told it was left therefore I couldn't get it back. I will not be back. I'll stick to Loves.

I am a truck driver. Been stopping here for 18 years. Place has been getting nice updates but showers are a problem. Went in today to shower and urine all over toilet. Was never cleaned. I've noticed this alot lately.  Plus my man and I ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ actually care about the drivers it seems only the money they get from small item sales. Bathrooms so out of date, showers are worse. Shower rule says husband and wife must take seperate showers for safety ,and health reasons. Funny ‚Ä¶
This place was terrible! She told me after I bought 400 $ In fuel that she didn‚Äôt have time for me to shower that the owner would kick me out ! Don‚Äôt waste youre time here
Very clean place. The clerks are friendly and the shower rooms were large and very clean but the water smells. I'd stop again if we were coming through

LUV THIS PLACE. IF U R KINDA HOMELESS U CAN BUY A 1 HOUR SHOWER FOR $6. I LOVE THE NEW THINGS STUFF THEY SELL. MSU STUFF,LOTS OF DIFFERENT LITERS,ASHTRAYS,HATS BANDANS,SUNGLASSES,KEY CHAINS. EMOJI STUFF üòÅ. I USUALLY STOP WHEN IM ON MY WAY ‚Ä¶
Nice place they have good shower for truck drivers
Free shower

Nice hot shower. Lots of parking. When trying to order pizza was told quote‚Äù now is not the time‚Äù. The deli person didn‚Äôt show up for work so no one there, not even the manager knew how to bake a pizza, obviously they just didn‚Äôt wanna make ‚Ä¶

AWSOME SHOWER GREAT STAFF PATIENT WITH ME I HAVE DISABILITIES THANKS FOR WALKING ON

SAM'S JOURNEY

My JOURNEY PICS HALL OF FAME ENJOY MY PILOT I LOVE PILOT THANKS FOR CARING
‚Ä¶ You can find a FedEx and UPS drop box here if you are looking to drop off a package. The facilities here are really clean and you can even take a shower if you'd like. ‚Ä¶

‚Ä¶ , we need the resting areas to be available to us. There are times that we have no time to use the rest room- and take a shower but when we do, ‚ÄúUnfortunately‚Äù it is ‚ÄúCLOSED‚Äù. It is unacceptable for the resting area (to take a shower) ‚Ä¶

I work in construction and find myself on the road for two or three weeks at a time quite often so I come here from time to time to take a shower. it's a great place with great people. I've always been treated very friendly, until today. ‚Ä¶

Really getting run down. Lack of maintenance.  All trash cans were full . Almost all showers were dirty. The shower I had was not cleaned. Just put new towels in and lifted the toilet seat. Sure has gone down hill.  Dennys has been closed ‚Ä¶
One of the best places to shower at Flying J. They actually clean and water pressure is great. And they stay on top of cleaning the showers. Very nice shower attendants!!!
Shower was nice compared to other pilot showers, ihop was a nice change from fast food. No complaints in parking or fueling either. DD Trucker reviews

‚Ä¶ bad reviews. I don't know about that because I don't like at any Denny's location. But, this is the cleanest truck stop shower I have ever seen in the U.S. I am Canadian and some of these places I refuse to shower but I found this location ‚Ä¶

showerReviews.reviewText:
The cashier who rang up my $8 shower (that‚Äôs a win) was kind and welcoming. Thanks for offering hot showers in a clean establishment!!

Showed up a weary traveler, left a happy camper!!

Sooooo much appreciated!!
Worst place to go for a shower I was a loyal customer and I'll never return back to that store I would not recommend anybody to go for a shower

‚Ä¶ and service!  Connected to convenience store for a quick stop for road trip snacks, beverages and even some cute gift ideas.  It's also a truck stop for pro drivers to relax and get in a shower before heading back to the highway!  Clean.
Very nice staff, nice clean shower, only $8 without fuel :-) Everything in the c-store is neat and orderly!
Plenty of truck parking, clean store, good shower, excellent food

showerReviews.reviewText: I was working close by there getting done late and wanting to go Doordaah... I stopped here they have $5 showers and both Bathroom and Shower area are Super Clean!!! I appreciate that!!! Staff on the late shift are Awesome!! üòé ‚Ä¶
Shower was very dirty sewer gas coming up through the drain in floor sink would not drain and was full of hair hot water only lasted about 7 minutes i guess that's what u get for 5 dollars
The last post a month ago nothing changed same nasty shower and restroom
Great place to shower
It's good. Not huge. Chicken but the pizza shop is closed down. No restaurant. One shower, with towels. Scale, not CAT scale. C store, standard gas station stuff.
Great workers here, great , fantastic even Shower(s)here too. Very helpful workers that are here.small place, but decent small, not TOO Small however. Great place to be ...
love the People who work there, They have a beautiful great Shower here, $5.3o.per.
Parking, less expensive fuel, food and shower.  Good place to stop for the night!
Cheap clean $5 shower no towels
